OOC: I hate my conmputer, when ITS want internet runs

Perceptor arrived at=
 the base mpulling asort ot pod. He enter to the same chamber that Jhiaxus =
and Hydras are  and facing them he said ironically "Someone was well-behave=
d here... Santa cames earlier this year"


Hydras quietly laughted 
  -----=
 Original Message ----- 
  From: Airshadow 
  To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
 =
 Sent: Saturday, November 03, 2007 7:59 AM
  Subject: Re: G2



  Perceptor=
:

  Perceptor leave the new base inside aq shuttle and  moved towards the =
old one.


  OOC: he will arrive in my next post



    ----- Original Mess=
age ----- 
    From: Richard Allen 
    To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
    Sen=
t: Friday, November 02, 2007 8:40 PM
    Subject: Re: G2


    ::Jhiaxus/Sc=
orponok::

    Jhiaxus smirks, knowing that the puppet is done. He moves ba=
ck to the computers to monitor the Atlantis base.

    Jhiaxus: Hydras, you=
 might want to check this out. Saying that the Maximal base is under attack=
 is the understatement of the millinium. I'm reading Minions all over the b=
ase. So many that it's hard to pick up Maximal signatures through them.

  =
  Scorponok: It seems I have arrived at a busy time...

    Airshadow <airl=
y2002@...> wrote: 

      Hydras:

      "The we should take advant=
age quickly of current situation, his base is under attack"said Hydras and =
soon he received an aencoded message from percepor "It seems that the puppe=
t is done, Perceptor is coming"






        ----- Original Message ----- =

        From: Richard Allen 
        To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
        S=
ent: Thursday, November 01, 2007 7:58 PM
        Subject: Re: G2


        =
::Scorponok::

        Scorponok: I guess I came at a good time then. The t=
hought of destroying Rodimus Prime... or Hot Rod... Whatever he calls himse=
lf. That foolish Targetmaster Autobot was a pain in many of my plans so lon=
g ago.

        Airshadow <airly2002@...> wrote: 
          Hydras:=


          Hydras hissed and said dryly "gretings... now our chances to de=
feat Rodimus prime increases"


            ----- Original Message ----- 
 =
           From: Richard Allen 
            To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
   =
         Sent: Tuesday, October 30, 2007 12:43 PM
            Subject: Re: =
G2


            ::Jhiaxus/Zarak/Scorponok::

            Jhiaxus: We'll us=
e the puppet.

            Jhiaxus spins out of the chair and stands up to =
greet the G2 newcomer.

            Outside the base the Scorponok body tra=
nsforms to a standing position with Zarak becoming the head. Scorponok walk=
s into the base to eventually find Hydras and Jhiaxus.

            Scorpon=
ok: Lord Jhiaxus, I am Scorponok; Headmaster warrior of the Generation 2 De=
cepticon Empire.

            Jhiaxus nods...

            OOC: Hydras shou=
ld recognize Scorponok and know Zarak. And not like him I might ad.

      =
      xochitla2006 <xochitla2006@...> wrote: 
              Hydras:

=
              Hydras typed some buttons and the doors opened he hissed "tel=
l them 
              that they can come in and I have more info bout this =
bot"

              A winged bot pictures, his wings were dull black hue. H=
is body was 
              a deep black with dull red highlights. 

       =
       "Jsut we have to wait that perceptor send us the puppet... unless 
 =
             you want to do this personally..." said devilish Hydras

     =
         --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, Richard Allen <roborick007@...> wro=
te:
              >
              > ::Jhiaxus/Scorponok/Zarak::
           =
   > 
              > After traveling underground for some time Scorponok c=
omes to the 
              surface just outside Hydras' base. Zarak opens t=
he top hatch and 
              climbs up top.
              > 
           =
   > Inside the base Jhiaxus takes note of this.
              > 
         =
     > Jhiaxus: Hydras, my G2 Decepticon comrade has arrived. Shall we 
   =
           greet him?
              >

______________________________
